name: Feed The Felines
description:
Created in 3 days for Even Weekend Game Jam #7.

Explore my apartment and interact with cats.  You might just learn a thing or two from them. Don't forget to turn on the speaker for some rad tunes created by Wiz_Rad.  Game is far from finished and does not have much of a goal yet.  

Controls:

WASD for movement

Left click for interaction

Esc to quit

Space for Jump, but you don't really need that

Planned Features:

More Cats!

Collect Food for the cats

Deliver that food to the hungry felines

Open doors cabinets and drawers

More details to the apartment

More killer tracks by Wiz_Rad
